article.title: NASA Awards SOFIA Engineering Contract Option to L-3 Communications
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: NASA's Dryden Flight Research Center has awarded a contract modification to L-3 Communications Integrated Systems for further developmental engineering on the Stratospheric Observatory for Infrared Astronomy (SOFIA). The option is valued at approximately $8.7 million, bringing the total value of the contract to approximately $37.7 million.
